movies.name: The Irishman
movies.description: A mob hitman recalls his possible involvement with the slaying of Jimmy Hoffa.

movies.name: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movies.name: The Social Network
movies.description: The story of the founding of Facebook and the lawsuits that followed.

movies.name: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.name: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

tv_shows.name: Stranger Things
tv_shows.description: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying forces in order to get him back.

tv_shows.name: Money Heist
tv_shows.description: A criminal mastermind who goes by 'The Professor' has a plan to pull off the biggest heist in recorded history - to print billions of euros in the Royal Mint of Spain.

tv_shows.name: The Witcher
tv_shows.description: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

tv_shows.name: Breaking Bad
tv_shows.description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer partners with a former student to secure his family's financial future.
